amendment.description: Amendment requires the Director of OMB to study programs authorized by the Act under the Program Assessment Rating Tool or a successor performance assessment tool developed by OMB.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 111-36 to require the Director of OMB to study programs authorized by the Act under the Program Assessment Rating Tool or a successor performance assessment tool developed by OMB.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Roskam amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Roskam amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Roskam.
